verses.verse: And it came to pass on the day <S%H3117><s%> that Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> had fully <S%H3615><s%> <S%H8763><s%> set up <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8687><s%> the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%>, and had anointed <S%H4886><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it, and sanctified <S%H6942><s%> <S%H8762><s%> it, and all the instruments <S%H3627><s%> thereof, both the altar <S%H4196><s%> and all the vessels <S%H3627><s%> thereof, and had anointed <S%H4886><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them, and sanctified <S%H6942><s%> <S%H8762><s%> them;

That the princes <S%H5387><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, heads <S%H7218><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%>, who were the princes <S%H5387><s%> of the tribes <S%H4294><s%>, and were over <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8802><s%> them that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> <S%H8803><s%>, offered <S%H7126><s%> <S%H8686><s%>:

And they brought <S%H935><s%> <S%H8686><s%> their offering <S%H7133><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>, six <S%H8337><s%> covered <S%H6632><s%> wagons <S%H5699><s%>, and twelve <S%H6240><s%> oxen <S%H1241><s%>; a wagon <S%H5699><s%> for two <S%H8147><s%> of the princes <S%H5387><s%>, and for each one <S%H259><s%> an ox <S%H7794><s%>: and they brought <S%H7126><s%> <S%H8686><s%> them before <S%H6440><s%> the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%>.
And the YY <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>,

Take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8798><s%> it of them, that they may be to do <S%H5647><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the service <S%H5656><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>; and thou shalt give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> them unto the L'vi'im <S%H3881><s%>, to every man <S%H376><s%> according <S%H6310><s%> to his service <S%H5656><s%>.
And Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the wagons <S%H5699><s%> and the oxen <S%H1241><s%>, and gave <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them unto the L'vi'im <S%H3881><s%>.

Two <S%H8147><s%> wagons <S%H5699><s%> and four <S%H702><s%> oxen <S%H1241><s%> he gave <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gershon <S%H1648><s%>, according <S%H6310><s%> to their service <S%H5656><s%>:

And four <S%H702><s%> wagons <S%H5699><s%> and eight <S%H8083><s%> oxen <S%H1241><s%> he gave <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto the sons <S%H1121><s%> of M'rari <S%H4847><s%>, according <S%H6310><s%> unto their service <S%H5656><s%>, under the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Ithamar <S%H385><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Aharon <S%H175><s%> the Kohen <S%H3548><s%>.

But unto the sons <S%H1121><s%> of K'hat <S%H6955><s%> he gave <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> none <S%H3808><s%>: because the service <S%H5656><s%> of the sanctuary <S%H6944><s%> belonging unto them was that they should bear <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8799><s%> upon their shoulders <S%H3802><s%>.

And the princes <S%H5387><s%> offered <S%H7126><s%> <S%H8686><s%> for dedicating <S%H2598><s%> of the altar <S%H4196><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> that it was anointed <S%H4886><s%> <S%H8736><s%>, even the princes <S%H5387><s%> offered <S%H7126><s%> <S%H8686><s%> their offering <S%H7133><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%>.

And the YY <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>, They shall offer <S%H7126><s%> <S%H8686><s%> their offering <S%H7133><s%>, each <S%H259><s%> prince <S%H5387><s%> on his day <S%H3117><s%>, for the dedicating <S%H2598><s%> of the altar <S%H4196><s%>.

And he that offered <S%H7126><s%> <S%H8688><s%> his offering <S%H7133><s%> the first <S%H7223><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> was Nachshon <S%H5177><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Amminadab <S%H5992><s%>, of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%>:

And his offering <S%H7133><s%> was one <S%H259><s%> silver <S%H3701><s%> charger <S%H7086><s%>, the weight <S%H4948><s%> thereof was an hundred <S%H3967><s%> and thirty <S%H7970><s%> shekels, one <S%H259><s%> silver <S%H3701><s%> bowl <S%H4219><s%> of seventy <S%H7657><s%> shekels <S%H8255><s%>, after the shekel <S%H8255><s%> of the sanctuary <S%H6944><s%>; both <S%H8147><s%> of them were full <S%H4392><s%> of fine flour <S%H5560><s%> mingled <S%H1101><s%> <S%H8803><s%> with oil <S%H8081><s%> for a meat offering <S%H4503><s%>:
One <S%H259><s%> spoon <S%H3709><s%> of ten <S%H6235><s%> shekels of gold <S%H2091><s%>, full <S%H4392><s%> of incense <S%H7004><s%>:

One <S%H259><s%> young <S%H1241><s%> bullock <S%H6499><s%>, one <S%H259><s%> ram <S%H352><s%>, one <S%H259><s%> lamb <S%H3532><s%> of the first <S%H1121><s%> year <S%H8141><s%>, for a burnt offering <S%H5930><s%>:
One <S%H259><s%> kid <S%H8163><s%> of the goats <S%H5795><s%> for a sin offering <S%H2403><s%>:

And for a sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of peace offerings <S%H8002><s%>, two <S%H8147><s%> oxen <S%H1241><s%>, five <S%H2568><s%> rams <S%H352><s%>, five <S%H2568><s%> he goats <S%H6260><s%>, five <S%H2568><s%> lambs <S%H3532><s%> of the first <S%H1121><s%> year <S%H8141><s%>: this was the offering <S%H7133><s%> of Nachshon <S%H5177><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Amminadab <S%H5992><s%>.

On the second <S%H8145><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> Nethaneel <S%H5417><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zuar <S%H6686><s%>, prince <S%H5387><s%> of Yissakhar <S%H3485><s%>, did offer <S%H7126><s%> <S%H8689><s%>:

He offered <S%H7126><s%> <S%H8689><s%> for his offering <S%H7133><s%> one <S%H259><s%> silver <S%H3701><s%> charger <S%H7086><s%>, the weight <S%H4948><s%> whereof was an hundred <S%H3967><s%> and thirty <S%H7970><s%> shekels, one <S%H259><s%> silver <S%H3701><s%> bowl <S%H4219><s%> of seventy <S%H7657><s%> shekels <S%H8255><s%>, after the shekel <S%H8255><s%> of the sanctuary <S%H6944><s%>; both <S%H8147><s%> of them full <S%H4392><s%> of fine flour <S%H5560><s%> mingled <S%H1101><s%> <S%H8803><s%> with oil <S%H8081><s%> for a meat offering <S%H4503><s%>:
